title: How Many Calories in Jello?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in jello per serving, including carbs, sugars, protein, and full nutrition details for prepared gelatin dessert.
assumptions: Prepared Jell-O brand gelatin dessert (e.g., strawberry flavor), one serving (1/2 cup or ~123g), made with water, no fruit or toppings added.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, flavor, preparation method (e.g., with milk), and serving size. Check product labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One serving of prepared jello contains about 80 calories and 19g of carbs.

label_note: Values mirror standard Nutrition Facts panel for easy comparison with product labels.

tweaks.label: Made with milk instead of water

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of jello?
faqs.a: About 80 calories for a standard prepared serving (1/2 cup).
Yes, regular prepared jello has 0g total fat per serving.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in jello?
faqs.a: Approximately 19g of sugars per 1/2 cup serving.

faqs.q: What's the difference in calories for sugar-free jello?
faqs.a: Sugar-free versions have only about 10 calories per serving.

faqs.q: Does adding fruit change the calories in jello?
faqs.a: Yes, adding fruit like berries can add 10-20 calories depending on amount and type.
